titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow over the death of Alexander Michael Odeh.
Expressing profound sorrow over the death of Alexander Michael Odeh.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life of the activist Alexander Odeh, who was killed in the 1985 Santa Ana bombing, and offers the condolences of the House of Representatives regarding his death.
